name: Hans Christian Andersen Quiz | Kid Lit Authors A - K | 10 Questions

questions.text: Hans Christian Andersen was born in France in 1805.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Hans Christian Andersen was born in Denmark in 1805.

questions.text: What does the ugly duckling turn into, in the story "The Ugly Duckling"?
questions.explanation:
swan.

	The ugly duckling is not liked because he doesn't look like the others. However he he grows up to become a beautiful swan.

questions.text: According to the song,  in the movie that is based on his story "Thumbelina", how tall are you "if your heart is filled with love"?
questions.explanation:
9 feet tall.

	Thumbelina was only a few inches tall, but the story "Thumbelina" teaches us that if our heart is filled with love we're really much bigger inside and that's what matters.

questions.text: What other name does the story "Thumbelina" have?
questions.explanation:
Little Tiny.

	"Thumbelina" or "Little Tiny" was written in 1835.

questions.text: In "The Emperor's New Clothes" the Emperor is actually naked.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Emperor thinks he has beautiful new clothes on however.

questions.text: When Disney made Hans Christian Andersen's fairy tale "The Little Mermaid" into a movie, what was the name of the Little Mermaid?
questions.explanation:
Ariel.

	In the original story, the mermaid doesn't have a name.

questions.text: What is the bird of paradise according to Andersen's story?
questions.explanation:
Phoenix.

	The Phoenix is a mythological bird whose tears have the power to heal.
